alert.note: Alert for Deuel; Frontier; Keith; Lincoln; Logan; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 01 at 3:28AM CST until January 01 at 12:00PM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST /11 AM MST/ TODAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST /11 AM MST/ TODAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 29 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of panhandle, southwest and west central Nebraska. * WHEN...Until noon CST /11 AM MST/ today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.

area.areaDesc: Deuel; Frontier; Keith; Lincoln; Logan; Perkins
